Translations.Text: Sapatha [1] nirmamabhabe utpatanakaridera
ara mrdubhabe bandhanamuktakaridera
ara tibra gatite santaranakaridera
ara drutabege agrasaramanadera
atahpara saba kaja nirbahakaridera
Sedina prakampitakari prakampita karabe
take anusarana karabe parabarti kampanakari
aneka hrdaya sedina santrasta habe
tadera drstisamuha bhiti-bihbalataya nata habe
Tara bale, ‘amara ki agera abasthaya phire yaba'i
curnabicurna asthite parinata ha'oyara para'o?’
Tara bale, ‘ta'i yadi haya tabe to eta eka sarbanasa pratyabartana.’
E to sudhu eka bikata a'oyaja
takhana'i mayadane [1] tadera abirbhaba habe
Apanara kache musara brttanta paumcheche ki
Yakhana tamra raba pabitra upatyaka ‘tu'oya’ya tamke deke balechilena
‘phira‘a'unera kache yana, se to simalanghana kareche,’
atahpara baluna, ‘tomara ki agraha ache ye, tumi pabitra ha'o—
‘ara ami tomake tomara rabera dike pathapradarsana kari, yate tumi tamke bhaya kara?’
Atahpara tini take mahanidarsana dekhalena
Kintu se mithyaropa karala ebam abadhya hala
Tarapara se pichane phire pratibidhane sacesta hala
Atahpara se sakalake samabeta kare ghosana dila
atahpara balala, ‘ami'i tomadera sarbocca raba.’
Atahpara allah take akherate o duniyaya kathina sastite pakara'o karalena
Niscaya ye bhaya kare tara jan'ya to ete siksa rayeche
